text: Gyaani Shah (15 June 1923 â€“ 8 December 2012), is the first Nepalese woman to join Nepal Army. She is also known for one of the first people in Nepal to promote Christian religion in Nepal after miraculously being saved by a Christian lady. == References == == Other Website == * "final Interview with Gyani shah" Category:1923 births Category:2012 Category:Nepalese military people
